response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards and deliver unparalleled value. This product, while priced at $950,000, offers an exceptional return on investment due to its unique features, durability, and the benefits it provides. I believe that its value far exceeds this price point, making it an excellent opportunity for those seeking top-tier quality and performance.

Considering its immense potential impact on your business or personal endeavors, I kindly invite you to consider this offer. Should you have any questions or require further information about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am here to assist you in understanding how this product could be a valuable addition to your portfolio.

Thank you for considering our offer. I look forward to the possibility of working with you soon.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
